author: prbuzz.com
title: The Ultimate Bulk Emailing Solution By Official Email Marketing
text:
With ever so increasing reliance over tech for handling businesses and targeting audience through internet it is almost mandatory entrepreneurs and their businesses to have an email marketing software to reach out to the prospective patrons. OfficialEmailMarketing.com is here with just the software to help people in expanding their business by allowing them to market hassle free through emails.
OfficialEmailMarketing.com , unlike other bulk emailing solutions also offer demo to test and check whether their software is according to the business’ requirements. The software is fully equipped to be able to handle the marketing campaigns. Official email marketing reports that numerous clients have benefited with the help of their software and many continue to get on board.
Factors that set this software apart from others in the market are its high speed servers that never go down, and a fully Supported Technical Staff to ensure an efficient campaign. The benefits of this email marketing software are you can send unlimited emails and it's fully can-spam compliant and follows the rules of responsible email marketing practices.
The CEO and founder of the company, Rodney Gray was Quote: d as saying, ‘Email marketing is based around good customer support and working with our clients to perfect their email marketing campaigns is a top priority’.
The software offers nominal packages depending upon the extent of marketing that the businesses wish to do with emails. The company guarantees top notch service with unprecedented tech support.
